pullRequest.title: Added the minecart's derailed velocity expression
pullRequest.bodyText:
Target Minecraft Versions: any 
Requirements: none 
Related Issues: none

commit.message: Added the minecart's derailed velocity expression

nodes.bodyText: As stated before on Discord, the condition and void method should not be on the same line.

commit.message: Put the conditions and methods on separate lines

nodes.bodyText: Can you remove one of the spaces here?
IMO you should add curly brackets to the if/else statement

commit.message: modified a few things according to the suggestions

nodes.bodyText: Both switches should have a default case that asserts false

commit.message: Reduced casting and fixed an issue

nodes.bodyText: You'll need to fix the license header
